stimulusHtml: The graph above gives the velocity, in in ft/sec, of a car for 0 ≤ t ≤ 8 , MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FAA@ where t is the time in seconds. Of the following, which is the best estimate of the distance traveled by the car from t = 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG0bGaeyypa0JaaGimaaaa@3BB4@ until the car comes to a complete stop?
